title: Science Information Literacy Education Using Multimodal Discourse

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Students can critically evaluate scientific information in various formats (text, images, audio) and identify credible sources.
Students can creatively reconstruct scientific information in multimodal formats to produce original outputs.
Students can understand and apply ethical principles for using scientific information (copyright, citation) in practical projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
